name: Workware Systems
overview: At the heart of every organization are processes, knowledge, and informationâ€”its lifeblood. The company do this by utilizing an agile based approach to analytics, collaboration and workflow application management rather than a rigid, â€œsoup-to-nutsâ€ solution provided by existing software vendors. Workware Systems customers no longer need to be held to one business process management / workflow application management architecture and process. They can tap into all available resources: both human & information systems-based.
